divs: sighting detailsthis is a follow-up to the incident i reported on 12-2-06. on this date, some object followed my daughters and i for over an hour, before a triangle appeared....this is our 4th triangle since feb 14, 2006. i tried to add pics to cms database, but was unsuccessful. i also attempted to attach the video of the triangle also with no success. i will file 2 seperate update reports with pictures...this one and one more. this report has pictures of an object that i took pictures of earlier in the same day as the previously reported event. in this follow-up report, i will show that the object morphed\changed...from a tiny dot\speck...into a large object. 1st picture...you will see the morphed object in the sky...original 2nd picture...cropped\zoomed copy 3rd picture...larger cropped\zoomed copy you may look up my previous report on the mufon cms database, for december 2, 2006....under clinton county, michigan. thanks! patty donahue mufon international fi & michigan mufon fi (clinton county)
Summary: 2nd Follow-up with pictures of an object that started out as a tiny dot/speck...then morphs into much larger object....
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Lansing
There were 3 other sightings in Lansing on or around December 2nd 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
